1.title: Battle of the Buds
1.plot: Professional chef Anthony Gu challenges host Julliet Pan to a duel for the tastier dish. Judges must pick between Julliet's traditional Chinese pork and Anthony's flashy Tuscany pork. At stake is a week's worth of free labor for the loser.

2.title: Sassy Girlfriends' Secret Menu
2.plot: Julliet and Fan TianTian help create healthy, slimming menus, discuss how to live a healthy and well-balanced lifestyle, and share recipes that will satisfy your taste buds without sacrificing your diet plan.

3.title: High Socie-Tea
3.plot: Julliet Pan, Kris Xu, and Liu Ye chat over hand-baked scones and Earl Grey tea as they empower viewers with the importance of dressing up your mind as tastefully you would your body.

4.title: Get More Bang for Your Buck with Office Pot Luck!
4.plot: Anthony Gu and Julliet Pan help viewers plan ahead by showing the delicious and super affordable meal prep recipes, perfect for working-class women. Also, consider teaming up with your office-mates in an office potluck.

5.title: Fountain of Youth or Organic Truth?
5.plot: Yang Le and Julliet Pan show viewers how to keep the fountain of youth flowing through their kitchens by sharing healthy, refreshing recipes made with ingredients from Yang Le's organic garden.

6.title: Steamy Kitchen-Let the Energy Flow
6.plot: Julliet Pan and Feng Shui master Charles Chou show viewers how to use mindfulness to enjoy their kitchen spaces when preparing dinner so as to promote a mood of joyousness and serenity, regardless of the occasion.

imdb.title: Steamy Kitchen
plot: Film writer and director Julliet Pan teams up with various Chinese co-hosts to create a cooking show for the women of today in which they explore the experience of cooking as it intertwines with a woman's career, charisma, and creativity.::Julliet Pan
